post.description: ren_queryTx returns the transaction state of the provided RenVM transaction hash.

txHash.description: The RenVM hash of the transaction that will be returned.

post.description: ren_submitTx returns the transaction state of the provided RenVM transaction hash.
ren_queryTxs provides a way of enumerating all transactions.

txStatus.description: The status of transactions that will be returned.

offset.description: The number of transactions that should be skipped.

limit.description: the number of transactions that should be returned

post.description: ren_queryState returns the current RenVM state, including information about gas prices for each chain.
ren_queryBlockState returns the current RenVM state, including information about fees and gas prices for each chain.
ren_queryConfig returns the current RenVM state, including information about gas prices for each chain.
ren_queryBlock returns the details of the latest block, or of a block at the height specified

blockHeight.description: The height of the block to fetch. If unset, the latest block is returned.

post.description: ren_queryBlocks returns the details of the latest block, or of a block at the height specified

blockHeight.description: The height of the first block to fetch. If unset, the latest blocks [n] blocks are returned.

txStatus.description: One of done, confirming, pending or reverted
